Articles.Content: Are there any good war servers with mods like Lazor Systems and Gatling Gun out there? I can't get a modded server to work on my own and other war servers I've found don't work with my KSP. Any suggestions?
hi, here is one war server kerbal.servegame.com:2076. And here info about this server http://kerbal.servegame.com:8081/

I'm planning to set one up today with a rather expansive mod list. It may get pushed up though.

You can read more about it here.
